channel.title: Comments on: Who Turned off Teh Interwebs?

item.title: By: Dave Cahill
item.dc:creator: Dave Cahill
item.description: Yep, pretty dodgy alright - Facebook's mapping of links between folks produced a pretty tight global map, China being the main notable missing link (other than sub-Saharan Africa); http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=469716398919
item.content:encoded:
Yep, pretty dodgy alright – Facebook’s mapping of links
between folks produced a pretty tight global map, China being the
main notable missing link (other than sub-Saharan Africa);
http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=469716398919
